item.title: Cara Install XAMPP Windows dan Linux
item.description: A. Instalasi XAMPP di Linux Download XAMPP : XAMPP Linux Buka Terminal > sudo chmod 777 xampp.run > sudo ./xampp.run > Membuat Shortcut XAMPP > cd /usr/share/applications > cd touch xampp.desktop > sudo nano xampp.desktop Copy dan Paste Script di bawah ini. [Desktop Entry] Encoding=UTF-8 Name=XAMPP Comment=XAMPP Linux Control Panel Exec=sudo /opt/lampp/manager-linux-x64.run Icon=/opt/lampp/htdocs/favicon.ico Categories=Application Type=Application Terminal=true > Perizinan Folder XAMPP > sudo chmod 777 /opt/lampp/htdocs B. Instalasi XAMPP di Windows Download XAMPP : XAMPP Windows
